Package model.core

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
model.core.Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
The Transaction class represents a vending machine transaction. It keeps track of the items purchased during the transaction, the total amount earned from sales, and the starting and ending inventory counts.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transaction()
    Constructs a new Transaction object with all values initialized to zero.

  • Method Details

    • getItems

      public ArrayList<Item> getItems()
      Retrieves the list of items purchased during the transaction.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the items purchased during the transaction.

    • isItemInList

      public boolean isItemInList(Item item)
      Checks if the specified item is already in the list of purchased items.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to check.
      Returns:
      true if the item is already in the list, false otherwise.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item)
      Adds the specified item to the list of purchased items. If the item is already in the list, its quantity is updated.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add to the list of purchased items.

    • updateTotalAmountFromSales

      public void updateTotalAmountFromSales(int itemPrice)
      Updates the total amount earned from sales by adding the specified item price to the total.
      Parameters:
      itemPrice - The price of the item sold in the transaction.

    • getTotalAmountFromSales

      public int getTotalAmountFromSales()
      Retrieves the total amount earned from sales in the transaction.
      Returns:
      The total amount earned from sales.

    • setTotalAmountFromSales

      public void setTotalAmountFromSales(int totalAmountFromSales)
      Sets the total amount earned from sales to the specified value.
      Parameters:
      totalAmountFromSales - The new total amount earned from sales.

    • getStartingInventory

      public int getStartingInventory()
      Retrieves the starting inventory count at the beginning of the transaction.
      Returns:

      Returns:
